D. Fisher Evans
Senior Software Engineer
I'm a Software Engineer that works on all aspects of my projects - front end, back end, side end,Â whatever. I believe empowering engineers by allowing autonomy of their solutions is the key to kick-butt results. Operations, QA, architecture, design, development: it all belongs to the team solving the problems. I prefer working in the JVM and have spent a lot of time living in AWS.

I primarily develop on Windows and am well versed in Unix based server/headless environments (ArchLinux, AIX, and Ubuntu).
My love of the graphic arts has led me to learn how to use Photoshop which has proven to be an invaluable skill in terms of UI and UX.
